name: 黃正民
objective: 數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
schedule:
Week1: Introduction
Week2: Modeling in the Frequency Domain
Week3: Modeling in the Frequency Domain
Week4: Time Response
Week5: Reduction of Multiple Subsystems
Week6: Stability
Week7: Steady-State Errors
Week8: Steady-State Errors
Week9: Midterm exam
Week10: Root Locus Techniques
Week11: Design via Root Locus
Week12: Design via Root Locus
Week13: Frequency Response Techniques
Week14: Frequency Response Techniques
Week15: Design via Frequency Response
Week16: Design via Frequency Response
Week17: State Space Representation
Week18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Homework                                  15%
Quiz (closed book)                     15%
Midterm Exam (closed book)     35%
Final Exam (closed book)           35%
materials:
-Textbook
Norman S. Nise, Control Systems Engineering, 6/e, John Wiley & Sons, 2011.
